Title: Adds public library systems to the list of county-wide shared services property tax savings law
Summary: Adds public library systems to the list of county-wide shared services property tax savings law.
LawCode: Amd Part BBB ยง1, Chap 59 of 2017
ActClause: AN ACT to amend part BBB of chapter 59 of the laws of 2017 relating to establishing the county-wide shared services property tax savings law, in relation to adding public library systems to the list of county-wide shared services property tax savings law
